description: Kai thinks the Internet has gone too far.
title: You can now search Yelp for emojis
contentencoded:
You can now search the online review site Yelp using emojis -- those little cartoon-ish characters you can create with a certain set of keystrokes.  
 
So...you search on a pair of scissors, you get listings for hair salons. A high heel gets you shoe stores. You get the picture(s).
 
I don't even want to search on a smiley face or a wink. Pretty sure the Internet has taken things one step too far.
 
We, of course, had to try it:
 
Some results were just... the usual for Yelp.
 
[[{"fid":"258356","view_mode":"default","fields":{"format":"default","field_file_image_alt_text[und][0][value]":"Rocket search emoji","field_file_image_title_text[und][0][value]":"Rocket search emoji","field_description[und][0][value]":"","field_description[und][0][format]":"full_html","field_byline_text[und][0][value]":"","field_migration_notes[und][0][value]":""},"type":"media","attributes":{"alt":"Rocket search emoji","title":"Rocket search emoji","height":380,"width":384,"class":"media-element file-default"}}]]
 
 
Others were pretty literal.
 
[[{"fid":"258361","view_mode":"default","fields":{"format":"default","field_file_image_alt_text[und][0][value]":"Bathtub emoji","field_file_image_title_text[und][0][value]":"Bathtub emoji","field_description[und][0][value]":"","field_description[und][0][format]":"full_html","field_byline_text[und][0][value]":"","field_migration_notes[und][0][value]":""},"type":"media","attributes":{"alt":"Bathtub emoji","title":"Bathtub emoji","height":402,"width":384,"class":"media-element file-default"}}]]
 
 
But seriously: Could this be a useful search tool?
 
 
[[{"fid":"258346","view_mode":"default","fields":{"format":"default","field_file_image_alt_text[und][0][value]":"Korean emoji search","field_file_image_title_text[und][0][value]":"","field_description[und][0][value]":"%3Cspan%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fspan%3E","field_description[und][0][format]":"full_html","field_byline_text[und][0][value]":"","field_migration_notes[und][0][value]":""},"type":"media","attributes":{"alt":"Korean emoji search","height":381,"width":384,"class":"media-element file-default"}}]]
